artist: Artist: Natori Shunsen; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and shoulders of man with red lines on his face and hand, wearing a multicolored geometric floral printed kimono with red trim
markings: red artist\'s seal: 春 {Shun} | publisher seal: 渡辺工 {Watanabe kō} (work of Watanabe) | on back: 進呈 {shintei} (complimentary)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Supplement to Collected Portraits by Shunsen
text: Sixth design of the supplement set. Based on Nakamura Kichiemon I as Arajishi Otokonosuke in the scene Ashikaga-ke yukashita of the play Meiboku Sendai hagi 伽羅先代萩　足利家床下, performed at the Kabuki Theater, October 1928.
title: Actor Nakamura Kichiemon I as Otokonosuke
